review_data.title: una serata italiana
review_data.content: herzliches, süsses restaurant. sehr leckere speisen. wir haben einen fantastischen italienischen abend verbracht!

review_data.title: Nothing wrong, nothing special
review_data.content: Their pinza is OK, their menu is OK, but overall I wasn’t impressed. An average experience, fairly good but that’s really it.

review_data.title: Schlechte Pizza
review_data.content: Gestern probierte ich im Genovas die Pizza Schinken mit Pilzen. Ich denke den Pizzateig muss man nehmen wie er ist....More

review_data.title: Excellent!
review_data.content: Genovas is simply a stunning place - real Italian food. The owners are very friendly and family’s are welcome. Avanti cosi!

review_data.title: Delicious, authentic and fair Italian food store and restaurant
review_data.content: Genova’s is a lovely restaurant and food store on Idaplatz selling Italian delicacies from the region of Molise, on the Adriatic coast. All their ingredients come from their farm in Molise and from small-scale producers in the region. We had mixed antipasti, including to-die-for burrata...More

review_data.title: klein aber fein
review_data.content: ob essen oder trinken, hier schaut man immer gegrne vorbei! sehr freundliche bedienung, kleine aber sehr gute auswahl von gerichten

review_data.title: Small cozy restaurant that serves a very good pizza
review_data.content: Come for the interesting Pinsa... a pizza made with a somewhat unconventional dough... and stay for the cozy ambience and neighborhood restaurant feel and the super nice waitress who will tell you all you wish to know about her hometown in Italy :) Nothing complicated,...More
